definition: similar (model)/merchandise similar to that used by a celebrity etc
like/same/similar/together/alike/with
section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: Complete this on-trend look with the matching ring.
sentences.chinese: 和同款戒指搭配，打造本季的最時尚造型。

sentences.english: Some are designing multiple versions of a garment to fit different body shapes.
sentences.chinese: 有些設計同款服裝的多種尺碼以便適合不同體型。

sentences.english: Combine this stunning piece with the matching earrings or ring for an on-trend look.
sentences.chinese: 和同款耳環或戒指搭配，時尚優雅。

sentences.english: Complete this on-trend look with the matching pendant or clip earrings.
sentences.chinese: 和同款鍊墜或夾式耳環搭配，打造本季的最時尚造型。

sentences.english: The necklaces within the Highlight family can be worn together for an on-trend layered and statement necklace silhouette.
sentences.chinese: 可以和同款首飾一起佩戴，凸顯你的時尚氣質。

sentences.english: This stunning creation has a nostalgic feel. Combine it with the matching earrings for an on-trend look.
sentences.chinese: 和同款耳環搭配，打造復古懷舊的浪漫風格。

sentences.english: Add the matching ring for a trendy, feminine look.
sentences.chinese: 您亦可搭配同款戒指，打造嫵媚動人的時尚風格。

sentences.english: Complimentary matching crystal earrings and rhodium plated chain.
sentences.chinese: 附奉同款水晶耳環和鍍銠項鍊。

sentences.english: Add the matching necklace or bangle for a funky, on-trend look.
sentences.chinese: 您亦可搭配同款項鍊或手鐲，展現時髦有型的風采。

déjà vu
